quips: Luck is the idol of the idle!
A ship in the harbour is safe, but that is not what ships are built for!
You cannot get to the top by sitting on your bottom!
Speaking without thinking is like shooting without taking aim!
There are no short cuts to any place worth going!
A lazy shepherd is the wolf's friend!
Conscience is the nest where all good is hatched!
Everything has beauty but not everyone sees it!
A bad worker always blames their tools!
A chain is only as strong as its weakest link!
Actions speak louder than words!
A journey of thousand miles begins with a single step!
An ounce of protection is worth a pound of cure!
A rolling stone gathers no moss!
Better to light a candle than curse the darkness!
The beginning is the most important part of the work!
Never interrupt your enemy when they are making a mistake!
Better to wear out than to rust out!
Cross the stream where it is shallowest!
Discretion is the better part of valor!
Fall seven times, stand up eight!
Fortune favors the brave!
Hands dirty, nose clean!
Practice makes perfect!
Strike while the iron is hot!
There is no time like the present!
When the going gets tough, the tough get going!
Where there’s a will, there’s a way!
*Contemplative silence*
The void summons all.
Cast your cares aside and chase adventure!
The kings of this world hold their heels to us.
Gold! Gold! Gold!
I bite my thumb at those who would see me fail!
Better to chase a dream than to dream of the chase!
